summary: REQ-4 (electric/neon-tech palette) appears implemented primarily by updating global Tailwind/CSS color tokens to cyan/magenta-on-dark style and enabling dark mode by default. No evidence in the diff summary indicates changes to layout or headline text/copy; immutable and UI-source paths were not modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Force dark mode by default via adding `class='dark'` to the root HTML element.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-4 asks to update the color palette but does not explicitly request changing the default color mode behavior; this is an additional behavioral/theming choice beyond just updating palette tokens.
